LinWeb is the creation of Sumit Sarkar out of utter boredom and the thirst of creativity. He just wanted to built something out of scratch and LinWeb came out of it.

And yes! He likes referring to himself in third person a LOT!

If you would like to contact him, just mail him or PM him on Facebook.
